quests.name: One Good Turn
quests.location: Angel Falls (Girl in front of the church)
quests.request: Bring her a Tangleweb.

quests.name: Pleased As Punch
quests.location: Stornway (Girl in church)
quests.request: Do the Air Punch Party Trick
quests.solution: Assign Air Punch as your Party Trick and perform it in front of the girl by holding B and selecting the assigned button.

quests.name: We Like To Party
quests.location: Stornway (Girl in church)
quests.request: Do a Pirouette, Clap, Jump and Air Punch consecutively.
quests.solution: Assign these Party Tricks (like before) and perform them in front of the girl.

quests.name: Pick Me Up a Panacea
quests.location: Stornway (Man west of the billboard)
quests.request: Bring him a Panacea.
quests.solution: Use the Krak Pot in Stornway inn.

quests.name: Herb'list
quests.location: Stornway Castle (Soldier inside the NW tower).
quests.request: Bring him a Medicinal Herb, Antidotal Herb, and a Moonwort Bulb.

quests.name: Get Well Water
quests.location: Stornway Castle (Soldier inside the NW tower).
quests.request: Bring him an Angel's Tear.
quests.solution: Get Fresh Water by the waterfall north of Slurry Quay and talk to the man on the bridge in Angel Falls twice for the Angel's Tear.

quests.name: Curious Crevice
quests.location: Stornway Castle (Man inside the Stornway Castle's well).
quests.request: Bring him 1 Slimedrop.
quests.solution: Most Slimes drop this item.

quests.name: Don't Cry Over Spilt Ink
quests.location: Stornway Castle (Old Man inside the library)
quests.request: Bring him 1 Magic Water.
quests.solution: Buy in Porth Llaffan's item shop or later shops. (Also sparkly spot North East of Swinedimples).

quests.name: Labour Of Love
quests.location: Stornway (Woman inside armour shop).
quests.request: Bring her 1 Evencloth.
quests.solution: Steal from Ragged Reaper. (#020).

quests.name: Wings of Love
quests.location: Stornway Checkpoint.
quests.request: Bring him a Wing of Bat.
quests.solution: Item drop from Drackmage (#024).

quests.name: The Not-So-Great Escape
quests.location: Coffinwell (Man inside the well).
quests.request: Bring him Hammer Handrills.
quests.solution: Use the Krak Pot.

quests.name: Putting on the Glitz
quests.location: Porth Llafan (Bunny Girl inside the inn).
quests.request: Equip yourself with fancy attire.
quests.solution: Equip enough gear so that you have over 250 Style Points.

quests.name: All Fired Up
quests.location: SW Dourbridge
quests.request: Bring him any item to burn.

quests.name: Snug as a Thug
quests.location: Dourbridge (Man in northernmost house).
quests.request: Bring him something fluffy.
quests.solution: Give him Lambswool which can be bought in Batsureg's item shop.

quests.name: Collapsus's Call
quests.location: Man collapsed on staircase, south of Zere Rocks.
quests.request: Bring him a Special Medicine.
quests.solution: Use the Krak Pot.
quests.reward: Granite Tunnel of Woe Lv. 1 Treasure Map

quests.name: Help Meowt Here!
quests.location: Bloomingdale; Cat on the 2F of the inn
quests.request: Meow?
quests.solution: Buy Cat Ears in Bloomingdale, equip them and talk to the cat.

quests.name: You Shouldn't Have... Really
quests.location: Angel Falls (Girl inside house near the entrance).
quests.request: Bring her 5 Belle Caps and 5 Fisticups.
quests.solution: Find the mushrooms at their respective spawn points and bring them to the girl to receive the Packed Lunch. Bring the Packed Lunch to her father who is near the entrance of Hexagon and then report back to the girl in Angel Falls. (Refer to ".gq Map").

quests.name: Our Precious Precious
quests.location: Mountain Pass (Woman at the north).
quests.request: Find the family's pet slime.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot to create a Slood and Gooey Gear. Only have the hero in your party and only equip those two items on him or her. Defeat a Slime (#001) in battle and once it joins you report back to the woman.

quests.name: Moving House
quests.location: Stornway (Old man at west of the town).
quests.request: Bring him a Raging Ruby.
quests.solution: He gives you a Strength Ring and all you need is a Corundum to alchemize a Raging Ruby.

quests.name: A Masky Task
quests.location: Stornway (Woman inside a house in the western part of town).
quests.request: Make a Papillon Mask.
quests.solution: Use the Krak Pot.
quests.reward: Stiletto heels for showing her the mask and a Jaguarment if you decide to give her the mask.

quests.name: Spud-She-Like
quests.location: Stornway (Woman inside a house in the west of town).
quests.request: Bring her a Sunstone.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.

quests.name: Mantle a la Mode
quests.location: Stornway (Man inside the armour shop).
quests.request: Bring him a Macabre Mantle.
quests.solution: Use the Krak Pot.
quests.reward: Seed of Deftness for showing him the robe and a Lunar Fan if you decide to give him the robe.

quests.name: Research Assistant
quests.location: Stornway Castle (Old Man inside library).
quests.request: Find information about Brigadoom inside the castle.
quests.solution: Obtain three Magic Waters and check the opened red chest in the middle of Stornway Castle's treasure room for a Crumpled Note.

quests.name: Battering Betterflies
quests.location: Zere (Man outside of the church).
quests.request: Scare 10 Betterflies.
quests.solution: Have someone at a high enough level to make the Betterflies flee from you in battle. Level 25 is sufficient.
quests.reward: Seed of Defence; Toad Oil for repeat.
quests.prerequisite: Need a character that has a high enough level to scare a Betterfly.

quests.name: Warbling Wellard
quests.location: Zere (Thug outside church).
quests.request: Bring him a Birdsong Nectar.
quests.solution: Use the Krak Pot.

quests.name: Doug and the Sluggers
quests.location: Coffinwell (Outside the Mayors house).
quests.request: Kill 10 Sluggers.
quests.solution: You can find Sluggers outside of Coffinwell.
quests.prerequisite: You have to have visited Alltrades Abbey.

quests.name: Big headed bard
quests.location: Coffinwell; Bard on the east of town
quests.request: Bring a Technicolour Dreamcloth to the nun in the church and report back to the bard
quests.solution: Use the Krat Pot

quests.name: Desert Foxes
quests.location: Gleeba; Read the sign SW of Gleeba in the desert. Check it from behind to accept the quest.
quests.request: Defeat Parched Peckerels (#094) until you obtain 10 Duneberries.
quests.solution: Defeat them around Gleeba and once you are done report to one of the dancers in the dancehall.
quests.reward: Platinum Ore; Silver Platter for repeat

quests.name: Fool‘s Gold
quests.location: Gleeba (Headquarters of the Royal Guard).
quests.request: Defeat the Gold Plated Golem.
quests.solution: Fight Gold Golems until you find them (South of Gleeba).

quests.name: Wrapper's Delight
quests.location: Gleeba (Soldier in SW House in Gleeba).
quests.request: Bring him 5 Grubby Bandages.
quests.solution: They can be stolen from Mummy (#098) in the Plumbed Depths in Gleeba.
quests.reward: Ruby of Protection; Corundum for repeat.

quests.name: Feather for a Fan
quests.location: Gleeba (Man inside the dancehall).
quests.request: Bring him 3 Hocus Chimera Feathers.
quests.solution: Defeat Hocus Chimera (#076) until they drop the items. (Zere Rocks).

quests.name: Oil Get It
quests.location: Gleeba (Merchant in center of town).
quests.request: Bring him Turbo Toad Oil.
quests.solution: Defeat Expload (#097) with a Critical Hit. They can be found near the oasis in the Djust Desert. Thunder Thrust and Hatchet Man usable.

quests.name: Lady of the Dance
quests.location: Gleeba (Book in the NW room of the castle).
quests.request: Find the Lady of the Dance.
quests.solution: Defeat Goodybag (#151) around Batsureg until she teaches you the dance.

quests.name: A Simple Task
quests.location: Batsureg (Girl in the center of the village).
quests.request: Get the 'Simple Simon' or 'Simple Simone' Accolade.
quests.solution: Equip enough gear to cover 250 Naïve Style Points.

quests.name: All Dolled Up
quests.location: Batsureg (Man in the SW tent)
quests.request: Retrieve the Ragdoll from the Brainy Badboon (#117).
quests.solution: Brainy Badboon must be put to sleep with either Snooze or Kasnooze before you use Half-Inch to steal from him.

quests.name: Little Miss Bossy Boots
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Girl inside the school, near the church).
quests.request: Bring her Holy Water and 2 Royal Soils.
quests.solution: Buy the Holy Water and get the Royal Soil from the spawn points.
quests.reward: Salute Party Trick; Thunderball for repeat.

quests.name: Funghi for a Fun Guy
quests.location: Pluvi Island (Small island southeast of Gleeba, Man inside a well).
quests.request: Bring him 3 Belle Caps.
quests.solution: Find them at spawn points.
quests.reward: Finessence; Magic Beast Horn for repeat.

quests.name: Muffled Admiration
quests.location: Wormwood Creek (Man inside weapons shop).
quests.request: Give a scarf to 3 types of Sanguini.
quests.solution: Defeat each Sanguini until they accept the scarf. Teeny Sanguini (#003) is by Angel Falls, Pink Sanguini (#080) is by Bloomingdale and the Genie Sanguini (#189) is on a small island north of the lake by Stornway.
quests.reward: Elfin Elixir; Mystifying Mixture for repeat.

quests.name: Follow That Fish
quests.location: Porth Llaffan (Jona's House in the SE of the village).
quests.request: Summon Lleviathan and defeat him.
quests.solution: Talk to the ghost in Porth Llaffan at night. Buy or alchemize a Watermaul Wand, Flowing Dress and Silver Shield. Talk to Jonah once you have them and go to the summit of Tywll Cave and equip the gear. Talk to Jonah again, defeat Lleviathan and eat the Fygg.

quests.name: Man Eating Vegetables
quests.location: Angel Falls (Woman inside the item shop).
quests.request: Get The 'Herbalist' Accolade.
quests.solution: Use herb items 100 times to earn the accolade. Check your Battle Records to make sure you get it and assign it in your profile.

quests.name: Style Gooru
quests.location: Angel Falls (Professor by the well).
quests.request: Bring him a Goododendron which is dropped by Slime (#001).
quests.solution: Defeat Slimes until you get the flower
quests.reward: Seed of Agility; Nectar for repeat.

quests.name: Letter Getter
quests.location: Stornway (Man lying down near the church).
quests.request: Bring him a Crumpled Letter which is dropped by Bling Badger (#251)
quests.solution: Bling Badgers can be found in high level Water grottos. Keep defeating them until you receive the letter.
quests.prerequisite: Post-game (Access to high level Water grottoes).

quests.name: Maid To Wait
quests.location: Stornway (Old man inside southern house).
quests.request: He wants to talk to his maid.
quests.solution: Buy a Maid's Mop and Maid's Outfit and equip your character with both item and talk to the man. The maid equipment can be bought from the secret shop in Dourbridge.

quests.name: A Climber for a Climber
quests.location: Coffinwell (Woman near the northern house).
quests.request: Obtain a 100 cm Beardy Weirdy from a Treevil.
quests.solution: Defeat Treevils (#110) in Urdus Marshland with the Fisticuff Stone's Throw ability. You will automatically keep throwing away the Beardy Weirdies you win if it is lower than 100 cm.
quests.prerequisite: Post-game and Fisticuff's Stone's Throw ability.

quests.name: Tale of the Paper Trail
quests.location: Coffinwell (Woman near the SE house).
quests.request: Retrieve 3 pieces of the Torn Exam Paper.
quests.solution: Fight random monsters around Coffinwell until you obtain all three pieces.

quests.name: Puttin'em In Platinum
quests.location: Coffinwell (Woman inside western house).
quests.request: Give her all of the Platinum gear (Sword, Shield, Headgear, Armour).
quests.solution: Buy the sword and headgear in Gleeba, buy the shield in Bloomingdale and alchemize the armour.

quests.name: Dozy Mayor
quests.location: Porth Llafan (The man inside the mayor's house).
quests.request: Wake up the mayor.
quests.solution: Obtain some Freshwater from spawn point at Slurry Quay and return to Angel Falls and speak to the man by the bridge so he can give you the Angel's Tear. Report back to the man in the mayor's house.

quests.name: A Task for a Cask
quests.location: Slurry Quay (Barrel at the dock).
quests.request: Bring it Holy Water, Freshwater, and Magic Water.
quests.solution: Buy the Holy Water and Magic Water from item shops and get Fresh Water from the spawn points.
quests.reward: Seed of Defence; Gleeban Guinea for repeat.

quests.name: Rock On!
quests.location: Zere Rocks (Boy near the church).
quests.request: Show him a Resurrock, an Enchanted Stone and an Agate of Evolution.
quests.solution: Resurrock appears at spawn points. Use the Alchemy Pot to create an Enchanted Stone and an Agate of Evolution.

quests.name: Confession of Cin'
quests.location: Bloomingdale (Nun in the church).
quests.request: Bring her a Dead Man's Dagger from the Bloody Mummy (#146) in Bowhole.
quests.solution: Keep killing Bloody Mummies until the item drops.

quests.name: A Martyr to His Ma
quests.location: Gleeba (Soldier in SW house in Gleeba).
quests.request: Bring him a Sainted Soma and take it to his mother in Wormwood Creeks item shop. She'll give you a Package from Ma to return to him.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.

quests.name: Tall Order Cook
quests.location: Gleeba (Cook inside the castle).
quests.request: Bring him vegetables from Zere.
quests.solution: Talk to the farmer outside the church in Zere and he'll ask for Horse Manure x3 and Cowpat x7. Obtain them from their respective spawn points and give them to the farmer. Report to the chef in Gleeba.

quests.name: Magmalice Mania
quests.location: Wormwood creek (Boy in item shop).
quests.request: Get a Magmalice Handprint.
quests.solution: Defeat Magmalice (#168) in Magmaroo until they drop the item.
quests.reward: Prince's Pea Coat; Bow Tie for repeat.

quests.name: Moai Memorabilia
quests.location: Wormwood creek (Girl inside the inn).
quests.request: Get a Mega Moai Headprint.
quests.solution: Defeat mega moai (#167) in Magmaroo until they drop the item.
quests.reward: Princess's Robe; Pink Pearl for repeat.

quests.name: Mummy's Little Hero
quests.location: Pool of Spirits Cave (Cave on Slime Hill).
quests.request: Bring him a Wakerobin.
quests.solution: Buy it in Bloomingdale.

quests.name: Nicholas's Necklace
quests.location: Island at eastern Stornway (Man in southern house).
quests.request: Retrieve the Memento Necklace.
quests.solution: After accepting the request, speak the man in the northern house at night to discover that the necklace was stolen by an Abyss Diver (#170). Keep fighting this monster near the four corners of the sea until it drops the item.
quests.reward: Seed of Defence; Strength Ring for repeat.

quests.name: Not Nicholas's Necklace
quests.location: Island at eastern Stornway (Man in northern house).
quests.request: Retrieve the Memento Necklace.
quests.solution: At night speak to the man in the southern house to find out that a Pink Sanguini (#080) stole the necklace. Defeat them in Bloomingdale until the item drops.
quests.reward: Seed of Agility; Agility Ring for repeat.

quests.name: Fixing the Sicklops
quests.location: Newid Isle (Tree on cliff near Alltrades Abbey, Boy on the cliff).
quests.request: Steal a Titanic Tincture from Atlas when his life is below 700 HP.
quests.solution: Atlas (#289) is a mid to high level grotto boss depending on how many times your Hero has revocated. Do 6000 damage to him and then begin to use Half-Inch to steal the Titanic Tincture.
quests.prerequisite: Post-game, Sterling's Whistle, Half-Inch and access to mid to high BQ grottoes

quests.name: Runny Bunny
quests.location: Hill east of Wormwood Creek (Bunny Girl inside northern well).
quests.request: Bring her Metal Slime Sollerets.
quests.solution: You have a 1% chance to find these in a Rank A blue treasure chest which are found in high level grottos.
quests.prerequisite: Post-game, Sterling's Whistle, and access to high level grottoes

quests.name: That Makes Scents
quests.location: Mountains east of Wormwood creek (Girl inside southern well).
quests.request: Give her ingredients for her incense.
quests.solution: She requires Nectar, Narspicious, and Thinkincense. You can get them from their spawn points.

quests.name: Mager Migraine
quests.location: Western Wormwood (In a well on top of the Plateau).
quests.request: Bring Cephalgernon some Hexite.
quests.solution: Find and defeat a Shogum (Grotto Boss).

quests.name: Bryan's Dyin' Wish
quests.location: In a Cave on the Island North of the Cringle Coast.
quests.request: Find the Larrrst Letter.
quests.solution: Fight Salamarauders in Tywll Cave (Porth Llaffan) until they drop it.

quests.name: Keep your Eyes Peeled
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Church).
quests.request: Find a Sign left behind by a famous Swordsman.
quests.solution: The Sign is located on the Island of Western Wormwood. Read the backside.
quests.prerequisite: After defeating the Dreadmaster and having a Party Member with 30+ Sword Skill.

quests.name: Turn in Your Badges
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Church).
quests.request: Bring back all of Marcos Badges.
quests.solution: Marcos Diary in the Teachers Lounge gives you hints where to look. You need to travel to the Locations in said order and fight Monsters outside of town. The Locations are Bloomingdale, Gleeba, Angel Falls, Coffinwell and Swinedimples.
quests.prerequisite: Quest #63 must have been beaten and a Party Member with 100 Sword Skill.

quests.name: Operation Mercury
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Hallway to the Gym).
quests.request: Defeat 3 Metal Medleys with the Pressure Pointer Abilty.
quests.solution: Travel to the Bad Cave (Bloomingdale) and hunt Metal Medleys.
quests.prerequisite: After defeating the Dreadmaster and having a Party Member with 30+ Spear Skill.

quests.name: Operation Multithrust
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Hallway to the Gym).
quests.request: Defeat a group of Gloomy Gastropods (2 or more) at the same time with the Multithrust Ability five times.
quests.solution: Travel to the Gittish Empire and do said task.
quests.prerequisite: Quest #65 must have been beaten and a Party Member with 100 Spear Skill.

quests.name: Nab the Knife-Nicker
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Kitchen below the Dorm).
quests.request: Defeat a Shivery Shrubbery with the Ability Toxic Dagger while it is asleep.
quests.solution: Find a Shivery Shrubbery around Swinedimples, put it to sleep via Snooze or another Sleeping Spell, then defeat it with the Toxic Dagger Ability.
quests.prerequisite: After defeating the Dreadmaster and having a Party Member with 30+ Dagger Skill.

quests.name: Spice Up Your Knife
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Kitchen below the Dorm).
quests.request: Finish off an envenomated Bad Karmour with Victimiser in ten seperate battles.
quests.solution: You can find Bad Karmours on top of the Plateau South East of the Bowhole or in the Dungeon of Gittingham Palace, then proceed to poison and defeat them. There is no use in defeating multiple Bad Karmours per Battle, as it will only count as one.
quests.prerequisite: Quest #67 must have been beaten and a Party Member with 100 Knife Skill.

quests.name: You Scratch My Back
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Bench to the west in the courtyard).
quests.request: Recover the Backscratcher.
quests.solution: Travel to Slurry Quay to talk to his former Student, who decided to open a shop there. He tells you that he discarded the Wand. Then travel to Tywll Cave near Porth Llaffan and defeat Salamarauders until one of them drops it.
quests.prerequisite: After defeating the Dreadmaster and having a Party member with 30+ Wand Skill.

quests.name: Look, Back in Anger
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Bench to the west in the courtyard).
quests.request: Bring Molten Magma and Toad Oil to the Old Man.
quests.solution: Molten Magma by
quests.reward: Wands and beyond (The Zing Stick Ability).
quests.prerequisite: Quest #69 must have been beaten and a Party Member with 100 Wand Skill.

quests.name: Staunch the Stench
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Blond man in western hallway in the school)
quests.request: Defeat Stenchurion (#171) found in the sea north of Gleeba with Deliverance until you receive the Mirror of Reflection.
quests.solution: The Stenchurion you defeat must be found in the sea north of Gleeba. Other Stenchurions will not drop the item.

quests.name: Jump for Joy
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Blond man in western hallway in the school at night.)
quests.request: Defeat Nemean with a normal attack while equipped with a Laundry Pole to receive the Staff Scroll. Then return to Paulo at night to complete the quest.
quests.solution: Buy the weapon in Stornway and Nemean (#284) is a low level grotto boss. Do about 2500 damage to him until you start hitting him with the Laundry Pole.
quests.prerequisite: Finish Quest 71, Staff Skill 100, Access to low level grottos

quests.name: Whipping Boy's Wish
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Boy on 2F of school)
quests.request: Get Mr. Whippy a new whip.
quests.solution: Talk to the Bunny Girl outside the Lighthouse and bring her a Hammer Fang. Power Hammers (#095) drop them near Gleeba. Bring it back to the Bunny Girl then report back to the boy.

quests.name: Mr Whippy Wish
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Man on 1F of dormitory)
quests.request: Run an errand for Mr. Whippy.
quests.solution: Talk to the Bunny Girl outside the Lighthouse and defeat Dreadful Drackal (Monster 175) which can be found around the Gittish Empire and Drastic Drackal (Monster 155) which can be found around Wyrmtail with the Leather Whip. (Buy the Leather Whip from Stornway). Report back to the girl to receive Catwright's Parcel and give the Parcel to the man in the dormitory.

quests.name: Rake a Tail Feather
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Man in the eastern room on the 1F of the school)
quests.request: Get 10 Tinny Tail Feathers by defeating Robo-robin (#112) with Can Opener.
quests.solution: Defeat them around Batsureg until you get 10 feathers. They are 100% drops if you defeat them with Can Opener.

quests.name: The Talonted Trio
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Man in eastern room on the 1F of the school)
quests.request: Defeat his three apprentices with Claws equipped.
quests.solution: Defeat Tearwolf (#126) at the south of Swinedimples Academy; report back and go to the Gittish Empire and within Oubliette B3, defeat Claws (#183); report back and defeat King Crab (# 188) at the four corners of the ocean. He must be defeated there in order to get the scene.
quests.reward: The Core of the Claw (Hand of God ability)

quests.name: Cool-Fanned Kook
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Woman in the eastern hallway on the 2F of the school)
quests.request: Bring her a Freezing Feather.
quests.solution: Defeat Apeckalypse (#128) outside of Swinedimples until they drop it.

quests.name: Oh The Indignity
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Woman in the eastern hallway on the 2F of the school)
quests.request: Defeat a Liquid Metal Slime (#153) with Fandango while wearing the Bunny Ears and the Bunny Tail.
quests.solution: Buy the Bunny Tail in Zere and either buy the Bunny Ears in the secret shop in Dourbridge or use the Alchemy Pot to create them. Liquid Metal Slimes can be encountered in the Bowhole or Slime Hill.

quests.name: Bring Oi Back Me Axe
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Man near the fountain)
quests.request: Bring him back his axe back from the Treevil that took it (#110).
quests.solution: Defeat Treevils in Urdus Marshland until the drop Max's axe.

quests.name: 'Atchet Job
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Man near the fountain)
quests.request: Defeat 3 Magmalices (#168), 3 Stone Guardians (#178) and 3 Bad Karmours (#186) with Hatchet Man.
quests.solution: Magmalice are found in Magmaroo and both the Stone Guardians and Bad Karmours can be found in Oubliette.

quests.name: Mallet's Mallet
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Female student in the middle room on the 2F of the school)
quests.request: Repair her hammer.
quests.solution: Go to the library on the 1F and read Mallet Monthly. Go to the Plumbed Depths of Gleeba and defeat Admirer (#099) until you get the Wobbly Jelly.

quests.name: To Shell and Back
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Woman in the west room near the entrance of the school)
quests.request: Defeat a Liquid Metal Slime (#153) with Bagsy Last while equipped with a Tortoise Shell.
quests.solution: Buy the Tortoise Shell at Porth Llaffan. Knock off 5 to 6 HP on the Liquid Metal Slime before you use Bagsy Last.

quests.name: Beautiful Bowginnings
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Thug inside the theatre)
quests.request: Defeat 10 Peckerels (#114) with Flutter Disaster.
quests.solution: Fight them around Batsureg.

quests.name: Beauty and Beyond
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Thug inside the theatre)
quests.request: Defeat 10 Boss Trolls (Monster 179) with Rain of Pain.
quests.solution: Before you fight the Boss Trolls in Oubliette, create the Wonder Pants with the Alchemy Pot. Once you are done defeating 10 Boss Trolls with Rain of Pain, report back to the thug.
quests.reward: Archery for the Adept (Shining Shot ability)

quests.name: Comeback Kid
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Boy outside of theatre)
quests.request: Defeat a Metal Slime (#046) with Power Throw.
quests.solution: Fight them in Quarantomb or Slime Hill near Angel Falls if you have Sterling's Whistle. Report back to the boy once you have done this, then walk over to the bridge that is to the west of Swinedimples to see a scene. Report back to the boy in Swinedimples after the scene is over.

quests.name: Brave the Caves
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Girl outside of the dormitory)
quests.request: Complete the Boomerang Master Exam.
quests.solution: Go to the art room on the 2F of the school and check the glowing spot. Defeat the following monsters with the Boomerang until they each drop an item. Mortoad (#062) in Tywll Cave, Hunter Mech (#087) in the Bad Cave, Living Statue (#150) in the Bowhole. You should receive "Basic Boomeranging", "Better Boomeranging", and "Bonzer Boomeranging".

quests.name: Sucking Up to Buckler
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Man in the west room near the school entrance)
quests.request: Block 10 attacks with your shield.
quests.solution: Go into battle and the blocking will happen automatically. If you have more skill points in your Shield Skill and a better shield then your chance to block a hit increases.

quests.name: Buckler's Buckler
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Man in the west room near the school entrance)
quests.request: Defeat 10 Killing Machines (#174) using Blockenspiel.
quests.solution: They can be found around the Gittish Empire.
quests.reward: Secrets of the Shield (Prevents critical attacks)

quests.name: Way of the Fitht
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Martial artist inside the theatre)
quests.request: Defeat 10 Wyrtles (#106) with Knuckle Sandwich.
quests.solution: Fight them around Urdus Marshland or Hermany.

quests.name: One Latht Tehth
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Martial artist inside the theatre)
quests.request: Defeat 50 enemies on the 10F or deeper of any grotto while wearing no equipment.
quests.solution: This requires a high level grotto in order to complete. Your level for your character should also be high. You may also want a Paladin or Warrior to always protect your unequipped character if their level is too low.
quests.prerequisite: Finish Quest 89, Fisticuff Skill 100, Access to a high level grotto

quests.name: Critical Appraisal
quests.location: Wormwood Creek (Farmer to the south of the village)
quests.request: Defeat 2 enraged enemies with normal critical hits. Thunder Thrust and Hatchet Man don't count.
quests.solution: Use the Warrior's Whistle ability to enrage the monsters and keep trying until you defeat two enraged monsters with critical hits.

quests.name: Warriors Three
quests.location: Wormwood creek (Farmer to the south of the village)
quests.request: Defeat 10 enraged Mandrake Marauders (#166).
quests.solution: Fight them in Magamaroo and use Whistle to enrage them.

quests.name: Eggclesiastic
quests.location: Wormwood Creek (Old man inside well)
quests.request: Defend against enemy attacks 30 times. If you run away from battle, the times you defended will not count.
quests.solution: You can defend with everyone, not just the Priest. Must battle in area outside of Wormwood Creek.

quests.name: Nurtural Selection
quests.location: Wormwood Creek (Old man inside well)
quests.request: Heal a character with critical HP (red) with Moreheal 20 times.
quests.solution: Must be done in battle. Damage floors can help you lower your HP.

quests.name: Free the Faerie Two
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Sleep at the inn with a Lv 15 Mage in your party)
quests.request: Defeat 10 enemies with Frizz while equipped with the Faerie Staff.
quests.solution: Any enemies will do.

quests.name: Faerie Nearly There
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Sleep at the inn with a Lv 40 Mage in your party)
quests.request: Defeat 10 Wight Priests (#135) with normal attacks while equipped with the Faerie Staff.
quests.solution: Fight them in the Old School at Swinedimples. You can use Oomph and raise the tension of your mage to attack the Wight Priests.

quests.name: Cry Wolf
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Martial Artist at the entrance)
quests.request: Defeat 5 Scarewolves (#081) while they are scared with the Martial Artist's War Cry skill.
quests.solution: Fight them around Bloomingdale. They must be defeated in the same round they are stricken with fear. If you are attempting this whilst solo, you can use tanglewebs to lower agility but otherwise good luck.

quests.name: Slowly, Slowly, Critty Golem
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Old man at the entrance)
quests.request: Defeat three Golems (#161) with normal critical hits. Thunder Thrust and Hatchet Man do not count.
quests.solution: Fight them around the Lonely Coast or near Upover. Switch vocation to Ranger for highest natural deftness which will help with critical hit rate.

quests.name: B-Coming one of the B-Team
quests.location: Dourbridge (Thief inside the bar)
quests.request: Steal a Tycoon's Trove from Hunter Mech (#087).
quests.solution: You can find them inside the Bad Cave. Use the Half-Inch ability to steal the item from them.
quests.reward: Rogue Robe, Roguess Robe and 1000 gold

quests.name: Busted
quests.location: Dourbridge (Thief inside the bar)
quests.request: Steal a Lunar Diamond from a Sorcerer (#120).
quests.solution: Find the monster in Gerzuun's basement. You must steal from the one in the basement.
quests.reward: "Thief's Theory": ability to steal after battle, 10,000 gold

quests.name: Eggstreme Sport
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Ghost in the bar)
quests.request: Use the Hero's ability Egg On to reach a state of super tension (100) 5 times.
quests.solution: You don't need to defeat any enemies with super high tension.

quests.name: Prat's the way to do it!
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Ghost in the bar)
quests.request: Do a critical Pratfall twice.
quests.solution: You will receive a message in battle when you have done a critical Pratfall. Use the skill Pratfall until you get a critical strike. You can do a single critical pratfall to two monsters at the same time. This will meet the quota. Revisit the ghost and then talk to the prisoner in the jail in Stornway Castle. He is located in the 2nd cell on the top of the screen. Say No to him.

quests.name: Gladiator Graduator
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Priest near the inn)
quests.request: Defeat 3 Slimes (#001) with Dragon Slash while in a state of super high tension (100).
quests.solution: Slimes near Alltrades Abbey don't escape but they do fuse.

quests.name: Glad to be of service
quests.location: Island east of Hermany (Man on the island)
quests.request: Defeat 10 Drackals (#118) while under the effect of Double Up.
quests.solution: You can find them outside of Gerzuun.

quests.name: Challengus Maximus
quests.location: Island east of Hermany (Man on the island)
quests.request: Defeat 3 Green Dragons with Double-Edged Slash while envenomated and under the effect of Double Up.
quests.solution: If your levels are too high, take off some armour so you have a better chance of getting poisoned. You can also use the Warrior's ability Whipping Boy to protect another person so that you can increase your chances of getting poisoned.

quests.name: Taking Soul Control
quests.location: Gleeba (Paladin on Gleeba's roof)
quests.request: Use the Warrior's ability Whipping Boy 10 times.
quests.solution: Multiple people can use the skill if they have learned it.

quests.name: Off the Record
quests.location: Gleeba (Paladin on Gleeba's roof)
quests.request: Defeat 3 Infernal Armours (#123) with Pincushion.
quests.solution: Fight them in Gerzuun. Knock off about 100 HP and then start using Pincushion. It would be better if your whole party knew this ability. If you levels are too high and you aren't doing any damage to the Infernal Armours, then unequip all your equipment except for a weak weapon, use the Gladiator ability Double Up and change to a very low levelled vocation.

quests.name: Top-Flight Knight Fight
quests.location: Gleeba (Paladin on Gleeba's roof)
quests.request: Use H-Pathy on a character with only 1 HP 5 times in battle.
quests.solution: Have two people who know H-Pathy in your party. Have one character keep giving HP to another character until his HP drops to 1. Then have the other character who knows H-Pathy use the skill on him. You can only do this once per battle so finish that battle and do it four more times. Alternatively, you can go to a dungeon area that has damaging tiles (like poison, electricity, lava, etc) and walk until you have a a character at 1 HP. Then go into a battle and use H-Pathy.

quests.name: Elementary Training
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Man in red inside Alltrades Abbey)
quests.request: Defeat 2 Metal Slimes (#046) while under the effect of the Mage's ability, Wizard Ward.
quests.solution: The person who cast Wizard Ward must deal the finishing blow. Knock of 2 to 3 HP and have the other Wizard Ward character defeat the Metal Slime. You can fight them in Quarantomb.

quests.name: Force in the Field
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Man in red inside Alltrades Abbey)
quests.request: Defeat 10 White Tigertaurs (#130) by successfully casting the Armamentalist's Sap spell on them twice and by defeating them while under the effect of Fire Fource.
quests.solution: You can find them north of Swinedimples.

quests.name: The Fource...Forever
quests.location: Alltrades Abbey (Man in red inside Alltrades Abbey)
quests.request: Defeat various monsters with each Fource effect.
quests.solution: In Magmaroo use the technique Fire Fource to defeat Magmalice (#168), around Swinedimples use Ice Fource to defeat Great Gruffon (#129), around Upover use Gale Fource to defeat Cumulus Rex, around Bloomingdale let 8 Slimes combine into King Slime (#080) and use Life Fource to defeat it. Finally use Funereal Fource to defeat Raving Reaper (#134) in the Old School in Swinedimples. Report back to the man in the Abbey.
quests.reward: Armamentalist Album (Fource abilities can effect the whole party)

quests.name: Ranger Changer
quests.location: Heights of Loneliness Entrance (The man at the entrance)
quests.request: Defeat 3 Hocus Chimaeras with Knife Skill, Toxic Dagger. They must die with poison damage.
quests.solution: Poison the enemy as soon as you can. Attack with a weak character and do about 50 damage to them. They will use Midheal so you may have to wait until they run out of MP before they finally die from poison damage.

quests.name: Hoarse Whisperer
quests.location: Heights of Lonlieness Entrance (The man at the entrance)
quests.request: Use Soothe Sayer 20 times on an enraged enemy.
quests.solution: Enrage an enemy with the Warrior's Whistle ability and then use the Ranger's Soothe Sayer ability to calm them down. You can do this multiple times in a battle.

quests.name: One-Turn Wonder
quests.location: Heights of Loneliness Entrance (The man at the entrance)
quests.request: Defeat Drakularge (#152) in one turn 5 times.
quests.solution: Find them in the Bowhole.
quests.reward: Ranger's Revelations (Chance for critical increases when HP is under 25%)

quests.name: Sages in the Pages
quests.location: Gittingham Palace (Bookshelf on 2F)
quests.request: Defeat 5 Great Trolls (#196) with the Mage's spell, Frizz.
quests.solution: You can find them in the Realm of the Mighty. Do about 600 damage to them before you start using Frizz.

quests.name: Sagier and Pagier
quests.location: Gittingham Palace (Bookshelf on 2F)
quests.request: Defeat Equinox (#283) with the Mage's or Sage's Bang spell.
quests.solution: Equinox is the first grotto boss and he can also be found in other low level grottos. Do about 1600 damage to it before you start attacking with Bang.
quests.prerequisite: Lv 15 Sage, Access to a low level grotto

quests.name: Engaging the Sage
quests.location: Gittingham Palace (Bookshelf on 2F)
quests.request: Defeat Atlas (#289) with the Sage's Zam spell.
quests.solution: Atlas is a mid to high level grotto boss depending on how many revocations you have done. Do about 6300 damage to him before you start using Zam. Increase the power of Zam with the Mage's Channel Anger ability.
quests.prerequisite: Finish Quest 116, Lv 40 Sage, Access to a mid to high level grotto

quests.name: A Star is Born
quests.location: Gleeba (Pink haired girl inside dancehall)
quests.request: Defeat a Moai Minstrel (#248) with the Minstrel ability, Hot Lick.
quests.solution: Moai Ministrels can be found in mid to high level Water and Nature grottos (161+ BQ). Be careful when fighting it as it can use Kamikaze when its HP gets low. Knock off 500 HP before you start using Hot Lick.
quests.prerequisite: Post-game, Access to mid to high level Water or Nature grottos

quests.name: Sign for Your Supper
quests.location: Gleeba (Pink haired girl inside dancehall)
quests.request: Defeat an enemy with the Luminary's Autograph ability. It must be a critical hit.
quests.solution: You will receive a message in battle when you have done a critical Autograph.

quests.name: Your Time to Shine
quests.location: Gleeba (Pink haired girl inside dancehall)
quests.request: Defeat 10 Moai Minstrels (#248). You must do the Luminary's Extreme Makeover and then enrage it with Eyes on Me. Whoever used these skills must deal the deathblow.
quests.solution: Maoi Ministrels can be found in mid to high level Water and Nature grottos. Knock off a chunk of its HP before you do your Extreme Makeover and Eyes on Me combo. Disco Stew is a good skill for your Luminary to use to kill it if your other skills are too weak.
quests.prerequisite: Finish Quest 119, Lv 40 Luminary, Access to mid to high level Water or Nature grottos

quests.name: A Cloudless Skye
quests.location: Upover (Girl on the stairs)
quests.request: Bring her a Clump of Cloud.
quests.solution: Defeat Cumulus Rex (#158) around Upover with the Miracle Sword (32 mini medals or buy from WiFi shop) equipped until it drops the item.

quests.name: Bert's Berfday
quests.location: Bloomingdale (Thug on 2F of Inn)
quests.request: Bring him a Birthday Cake and Party Popper.
quests.solution: Both can be bought in the WiFi shop. Or received from special guests in the inn on your birthday.

quests.name: A Present From the Past
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to Erinn from behind the counter in the inn)
quests.request: Retrieve a gift.
quests.solution: Go to a grotto that has "of Doulour" in its title and defeat the boss in that grotto to receive a scene with Erinn.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Access to a Dolour grotto

quests.name: Risque Respects
quests.location: Stornway (Granny to the east of the town)
quests.request: Bring her a Dangerous Bustier.
quests.solution: You can find one in a rank 5 Blue Treasure Chest in the grottos or use the Alchemy Pot if you have a Silk or Divine Buster.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Access to mid to high level grottos

quests.name: Perk Up, Patty!
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to Sellma from behind the counter in the inn)
quests.request: Cheer Patty up.
quests.solution: Talk to Patty from behind the counter then Zoom to Batsureg and talk to the chief's father, Batkhaan. Afterwards, go back to Stornway and talk to Patty again. At night, talk to the ghost in Batsureg and sail to Khalaag coast which is north of Batsureg. If you use the Starflight Express to get there then you will not get the scene. Examine the gravestone to the east to receive the Friendant. Report back to Patty.

quests.name: Puff-Puff Performance
quests.location: Hunter's Yurts (Girl to the west)
quests.request: Bring her a Cheer-me-up herb.
quests.solution: Use Half-Inch to steal from Boss Troll (#179) in Oubliette until you get the item.

quests.name: A Right Royal Nightmare
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to the king)
quests.request: Cure him of his nightmares.
quests.solution: Talk to the woman in the east side of Wormwood Creek's church. Gather Malicitie, Manky Mud, and a Sage's Elixer for her. Bring her the ingredients and she will give you the Nightmare Nurse. Report back to the king.

quests.name: P-P-Pick Up a Pickaxe
quests.location: Stornway (Thug inside Stornway Castle's well)
quests.request: Bring him a Platinum Pick.
quests.solution: Defeat a Darkonium Slime in a mid to high level Ruins grotto until it drops the item.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Finish Quest 7, Access to mid to high level Ruins grottos

quests.name: A Spot of Book-Keyping
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to the princess)
quests.request: Help her unlock the book.
quests.solution: Talk to the old man in Stornway's item shop. Clear a grotto with "Silver" in its title for the Little Key. Report back to the princess who is now in her room.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Finish Quests 23 and 127, Access to a Silver grotto

quests.name: Exhume the Heirloom
quests.location: Djust Desert (Talk to the ghost in the poison swamp at night, the swamp is to the west of Gleeba)
quests.request: Retrieve the Old Ring.
quests.solution: Find the Old Ring by clearing a Water grotto.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Sterling's Whistle, Access to a Water grotto

quests.name: Making Room in Brigadoom
quests.location: Stornway (Woman outside the church)
quests.request: Attend a meeting in Brigadoom.
quests.solution: Go to the Brigadoom throne room and defeat 2 Scarlet Fevers (#242), afterwards go down the stairs for a scene and defeat the last one.

quests.name: Tree-Hugging Titan
quests.location: Newid Isle (Tree on cliff near Alltrades Abbey, Talk to the Cyclops)
quests.request: Scare off a Gigantes (#193) in the Tower of Nod.
quests.solution: Do about 500 damage to the Gigantes and use the Ranger skill, Mercy to scare him away.
quests.reward: Seed of Life; Ace of Clubs for repeat

quests.name: Recruitment Drive
quests.location: Stornway (Man by the church)
quests.request: Convince the maid to join the brigade.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot to create a Full Moon Axe and talk to the Maid on the 1F of Stornway castle. Report back to the man.

quests.name: When Tax Attacks
quests.location: Hermany (Man inside the house on the hill)
quests.request: Meet the tax collector.
quests.solution: At night, defeat a Hunter Mech (#087) outside of the house.

quests.name: To Brigadoom!
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to woman outside of church)
quests.request: Attend an inauguration at Brigadoom.
quests.solution: Go to the Bridgadoom throne room and defeat Scarlet Fever (#242).

quests.name: EXTERMINATE!
quests.location: Hermany (Bookshelf in the house on the hill)
quests.request: Defeat 3 Metal Slimes (#046) in the same battle. Do this 3 times.
quests.solution: Battle them on Slime Hill which is north of Angel Falls.
quests.reward: Metal Slime Shield; Mini Medal for repeat

quests.name: Yore For It now!
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to the king)
quests.request: Examine the coffin at the end of the tunnel inside the well in Stornway castle.
quests.solution: Defeat Yore (#278).

quests.name: Shaman You!
quests.location: Small Island by lake near Stornway (Talk to the shaman)
quests.request: Equip 3 pieces of cursed equipment on the hero.
quests.solution: If all of your cursed equipment is no longer cursed, you can use Malicites to curse them again.

quests.name: Has Sellma Sold Out?
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to Sellma from behind the counter in the inn)
quests.request: Help Sellma.
quests.solution: Talk to Sellma, then the banker from behind the counter. You should get the Guestbook. Now talk to Erinn and Sellma and leave for Gleeba. At Gleeba go into the Plumbed Depths and go through the magic door. Make your way to the graveyard and access the secret stairs to B3 to fight Rover (#279). Report back to Erinn.

quests.name: Apt Pupil
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Talk to Swindimple's ghost in the Old School at night)
quests.request: Use the Salute Party Trick to talk to him then accept the quest.
quests.solution: Dress everyone in the Swinedimple Blazers (he gives them to you) and defeat Sir Sanguinus (#288) in a mid to high level grotto. Report back to Swinedimples and use the Salute again.
quests.reward: Blessed Bindings, Tantric Trousers and Brahman Boots; Brainy Bracer for repeat
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Finish Quest 36, Access to mid to high level grottos

quests.name: Coffinwell Conundrum
quests.location: Coffinwell (Talk to Dr. Phlegming in his lab at night)
quests.request: Bring him the Encylopaedia Gittanica.
quests.solution: It can be found on B3F in Oubliette.

quests.name: Prayermongering
quests.location: Pool of Spirits Cave (NE of Angel Falls, Ghost in the cave)
quests.request: Fill a Gratite.
quests.solution: Complete 5 more quests. You can redo the repeatable quests too.
quests.reward: Metal Slime Helmet; Brighten Rock for repeat

quests.name: Thingy, King of, er…
quests.location: Quarantomb (Ghost in B1F)
quests.request: Retrieve the Royal Seal.
quests.solution: Use Half-Inch to steal the item from Trauminator (#286). He is a boss that can be found in low to mid level grottos.

quests.name: Claws for Thought
quests.location: Stornway (Ghost in weapon shop at night)
quests.request: Show him some Beastmaster Claws.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.

quests.name: Mysterious Monarch
quests.location: Gittingham Palace (Talk to ghost of Goresby-Purrvis near the entrance)
quests.request: Defeat King Godfrey (#280).
quests.solution: Find him on the 4F of Gittingham Palace and report back to Goresby-Purrvis once he is defeated.

quests.name: Hail to the Queen
quests.location: Inside the Starflight Express; Talk to Stella
quests.request: Make her a new outfit.
quests.solution: Bring her a Butterfly Wing, Technicolour Tutu, Sleeping Hibiscus and Mythril Ore.

quests.name: Licensed to Drive
quests.location: Inside the Starflight Express (Talk to Sterling)
quests.request: Collect 9 Gortress Guerilla Stamps. Restrictions are that you can only land the Starflight Express 6 times & you can't use Zoom or Evac
quests.solution: Sterling will give you the first stamp. Fly to Batsureg and talk to Conner behind a tent to get your next stamp. Fly to the Heights of Lonlieness and talk to Victor at the entrance. Walk to Bloomingdale and go to the church's rooftop to find Dusty. Fly to Angel Falls and to the west of the waterfall you will find Godfrey. Walk to Coffinwell and to the north west you will find Dodger. Fly to Alltrades Abbey and Cribber will be by the 1F stairs. Fly to Wormwood Creek to find Forger inside the weapon shop. Fly to the Gortress and the last member, Digby, will be at the top of the tower. Board the Starflight and use the inside view to talk to Sterling. Go to the locked door at the very back.

quests.name: Flaptricide
quests.location: Inside the Starflight Express (Talk to Stella)
quests.request: Help a girl in the inn at Dourbridge by giving her Stellar Medicine.
quests.solution: Talk to the girl in the inn after accepting the quest. Bring Stella an Elfin Elixir, Perfect Panacea, Special Medicine and a Yggdrasil Bud. Fly to the Yggrdrasil spawn point to receive the Bud and use the Alchemy Pot to get the rest. Talk to Stella in the Starflight when you have everything. Bring the Stellar Medicine to the girl and report back to Stella in the Starflight.

quests.name: Intreeguing Mystery
quests.location: Bloomingdale (Scholar in the center of town)
quests.request: Find proof of the Phantom Tree.
quests.solution: Go to the tree on Pluvi Isle and check the shining spot. Go to Gleeba and talk to the priest in the church and then talk to the scholar in Bloomingdale. Head for the Ondor Cliffs to the west of Batsureg and read the three shining graves and report back to the scholar.

quests.name: Annihilimobliteration!?
quests.location: Inside the Starflight Express (Talk to Stella by the back)
quests.request: Defeat Tyrannosaura Wrecks (#281) in the locked room.
quests.solution: After defeating the enemy, enter the portal for a scene and report to Stella afterwards.

quests.name: Pushy Peddler
quests.location: Lonely Coast, east of Zere Rocks (Man in cave)
quests.request: Bring him an Ethereal Stone.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
quests.reward: Malroth Map; Mythril Ore for repeat

quests.name: Marey Questmas
quests.location: Cringle Coast, most NE island; Talk to Chris Cringle in the house
quests.request: Bring him 8 Heavenly Horseshoes.
quests.solution: Defeat Tantamount (#239) in a mid to high level Volcano grotto in 5 turns to get a Heavenly Horseshoe. Do this 8 times and report back to Cringle.
quests.reward: Estark Map; Technicolour Dreamcloth for repeat
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to a mid or high level Volcano grotto

quests.name: Not-So-Jolly Roger
quests.location: Wyrmtail (Skeleton in cave)
quests.request: Defeat Fowleye (#291) within 15 turns.
quests.solution: He is a grotto boss that can be found in a mid to high level grotto.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Access to mid to high level grottos

quests.name: Nightmarey Questmas
quests.location: Cringle Coast, most NE island (Bookshelf in the house)
quests.request: Defeat Night Knight (#199) with a Holy Water.
quests.solution: You can fight them in the Realm of the Mighty. They have 256 HP. Remember to put a few Holy Waters in your item inventory.
quests.reward: Cape of Good Karma; Mercury's Bandana for repeat

quests.name: Christinamas Cake
quests.location: Bloomingdale (Girl by the item shop)
quests.request: Give a Christmas Cake to Santa.
quests.solution: Buy the Christmas Cake from the Wi-Fi shop and give it to Chris Cringle at Cringle Coast and report back to the girl.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Cancel or Finish Quest #152 if active

quests.name: Inn Search of an Inny
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to Patty from behind the counter in the inn)
quests.request: Give her Birdsong Nectar, Astral Plume, Technicolour Dreamcloth and a Brilliant Biscuit.
quests.solution: Brilliant Biscuit is dropped by Gem Jamboree (#207) which can be found in mid to high level Ruins grottoes. Use the Alchemy Pot for the rest of the items. Talk to Patty, then Erinn, then Patty once more.

quests.name: Inn for a Penny, Inn for an Inny
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to Erinn from behind the counter in the inn)
quests.request: Defeat Octagoon (#219) 20 times.
quests.solution: Talk to the king after initating quest. Fight Octagoon in mid to high level Ruin grottos. Report to the king once complete and then to Erinn.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Finish Quest 156, access to mid to high level Ruin grottos

quests.name: Battle Buff
quests.location: Heights of Lonlieness Entrance (Talk to the man on the left)
quests.request: Defeat Trauminator (#286) without anything equipped.
quests.solution: He is a grotto boss that can be found in mid level grottos.
quests.reward: Mortamor Map; Raging Ruby for repeat
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Access to mid level grottos

quests.name: Have You Seen Charlene?
quests.location: Wormwood Creek (Mayor in his house)
quests.request: Bring 5 Sleeping Hibiscus and 2 Celestial Skeins to the girl in the cave north of Wormwood Creek.
quests.solution: Buy the Sleeping Hibiscus in Bloomingdale & use the Alchemy Pot for the Celestial Skeins. Bring these to the girl and report to the mayor.

quests.name: Chronic Delay
quests.location: Wormwood Creek (Mayor in his house)
quests.request: Bring the dragon chronicler to Wormwood Creek.
quests.solution: Talk to the man in Upover's Inn. Bring him a Lunaria, Aggressence and Trailblazing Bandana. Use the Alchemy Pot to make them. Then meet him on the summit of Magmaroo and report back to the mayor in Wormwood Creek.

quests.name: Here With Nod's Tear
quests.location: Bloomingdale (Mayoress in her house (not the mansion))
quests.request: Bring a Dragon's Tear to the mayoress of Bloomingdale.
quests.solution: Talk to the man by the item shop and he'll tell you that he will trade you his Dragon's Tear for a Crown Jewel. You can find a Crown Jewel by clearing a grotto that has more than 8 floors and also has "of Fear" in its title. After you make the trade report back to the mayoress in Bloomingdale.

quests.name: Do Nod Disturb
quests.location: Tower of Nod, north of Coffinwell (Slime by the entrance)
quests.request: Recover Nod's Tear.
quests.solution: Go to the top of the tower and examine Nodoph. Then go to B4 of Oubliette and examine the shiny spot for Nod's tear. Battle Nodoph at the top of the Tower of Nod.

quests.name: When a Star Wishes Upon You
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to Pavo from behind the counter at the inn)
quests.request: Defeat Excalipurr (#292) for the Prayer Pearl.
quests.solution: He is a grotto boss that can be found in a high level grotto and report back to Pavo once completed. Then go to the Realm of the Almighty and speak with Celestria. Talk to Pavo again and go to Angel Falls and talk to Aquila. Go back and talk to Pavo one last time.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Finish Quest 157, access to high level grotto

quests.name: Fixing Fickser's Fix
quests.location: Well on a hill, north of Upover (Man with the turban in the well)
quests.request: Bring him a Lucky Pendant.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
quests.reward: Crown of Clarity; Sorcerer's Ring for repeat

quests.name: Shame on Goo
quests.location: Angel Falls (Slime in the well)
quests.request: Defeat 8 different slimes.
quests.solution: Defeat Metal Slime Knight (#75), Metal Medley (#89), Liquid Metal Slime (#153), Gem Jamboree (#207), Metal King Slime (#214), Slionheart (#215), Platinum King Jewel (#229) and Prime Slime (#252).
quests.reward: Metal Slime Sword; Slime Crown for repeat
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to many different grottos

quests.name: Research and Destroy
quests.location: Well on a hill, west of Batsureg (Man in the well)
quests.request: Defeat Elusid (#287) very quickly.
quests.solution: He is a low level grotto boss. Beating him in 8 turns is good enough.
quests.reward: Red Orb; Sorcerer's Stone for repeat
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to low level grottos

quests.name: Who's a Pretty Boy?
quests.location: Cringle Coast, most NE island (Bird near the house)
quests.request: Defeat Bird Of Terrordise (#241) for the Jewellery Box and Terrodise Tail Feather.
quests.solution: You can find it in high level Volcano grottos.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to high level Volcano grottos

quests.name: Potty About Pots
quests.location: Zere (Talk to the old man in the well)0
quests.request: Get him some good earth from a Nature grotto.
quests.solution: Complete a Nature grotto that is 12 or more floors deep to fill the Dirtbag. Report back to the old man.
quests.reward: Hela's Hammer; Hephaestus's Flame for repeat
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to a Nature grotto

quests.name: Competition Commission
quests.location: Stornway (Man to the north of the castle on 1F)
quests.request: Bring him a Sage's Stone.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.

quests.name: Maiding and Abetting
quests.location: Stornway (Maid in castle's kitchen)
quests.request: Bring her a Heavy Hatchet.
quests.solution: It's a rare drop from AU-1000 (#227), a high level Ruins grotto monster. Also be found in rank B treasure chests in grottoes.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to high level Ruins grotto

quests.name: I Would Do Anyfang for Love
quests.location: Hunter's Yurts (Man at the northwest of the settlement)
quests.request: Bring him a Drakulord's Tooth.
quests.solution: Defeat a Drakulord within 3 turns in a high level Water grotto.

quests.name: Namesake Maker
quests.location: Hill northeast of Stornway (Loch Storn)
quests.request: Bring the man a Flame Tang knife.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.

quests.name: Plum Duffer
quests.location: Gleeba (Man by the armour shop)
quests.request: Bring him 10 Plum Stones.
quests.solution: Defeat Seaverns (#256) in a high level Water grotto until you meet the quota.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to high level Water grottos

quests.name: Agates Ain't Great…Are They?
quests.location: Stornway (Talk to the ghost on the 3F of the castle)
quests.request: Bring it an Agate of Evolution.
quests.solution: Use the Salute Party Trick to greet him before you show him the item. The item can be made with the Alchemy Pot.

quests.name: If I'Ad an 'Ammer
quests.location: Hill southwest of Stornway
quests.request: Bring him a Megaton Hammer.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.

quests.name: Well Forgetful
quests.location: Well on a hill, south of Batsureg (Man in the well)
quests.request: Bring him some Cannibelle rage.
quests.solution: Fight Cannibelle (#230) in mid to high level Ice grotto. Use the Warrior's skill, Whistle to enrage her 10 times. You can also fight Cannibelles on the island east of Stornway that has two cabins, and they are found as an uncommon spawn.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to mid to high level Ice grottos

quests.name: Tones of the Bones
quests.location: Wyrmtail (Skeleton in cave)
quests.request: Bring him a Bone Chimer.
quests.solution: Defeat Blight Knight (#237) in a high level Ice grotto with a the Hammer skill, Heart Breaker until he drops the item.
quests.reward: Rusty Armour; Saint's Ashes for repeat
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to a high level Ice grotto

quests.name: From Rust to Riches
quests.location: Brigadoom (Grave to the northeast once you enter)
quests.request: Equip all of the Erdrick equipment (Sword, Shield, Helmet, Armour and Gauntlets).
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot to make them, equip them and examine the grave again.

quests.name: Pants Macabre
quests.location: Wyrmtail (Skeleton in cave)
quests.request: Bring him some Grundies.
quests.solution: The item can be stolen from Cumulus Hex (#212) and he can be found in a high level Nature grotto. You must use the Minstrel's Pratfall skill to make him laugh and then use Half-Inch to steal from him on the same turn.
quests.reward: Rhapthorne Map; Wonder Pants for repeat
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to a high level Nature grotto

quests.name: Wrecking Wrecks
quests.location: Gittingham Palace (Bookshelf on 2F)
quests.request: Defeat Tyrannosaurus Wrecks (#293).
quests.solution: He is a grotto boss that can be found in high level grottos. Once he is defeated report back to the book.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, Finish Quest 117, Lv 70+ Sage must be in your party to intiate quest, access to high level grottos

quests.name: Can We Borya for a Second?
quests.location: Tower of Nod, north of Coffinwell (Man south of the tower)
quests.request: Equip Borya's Bouffant, Borya's Robe and Borya's Boots.
quests.solution: Talk to Borya, make your birthday the same date as today and talk to him again, and make your hero a mage and talk to him one more time for the last piece of equipment.

quests.name: An Immaculate Conception
quests.location: Stornway (Man to the north of the castle on 1F)
quests.request: Bring him a Goddess Shield.
quests.solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.

quests.name: Poison Needle 1 Ow 1
quests.location: Swinedimples Academy (Female ghost in the Old School at night)
quests.request: Bring Master Moosifer's (#245) HP down to 1 and defeat him with the Poison Needle.
quests.solution: He can be fought in high level Volcano grottos. Do about 900 damage and then attack with Poison Needle. The Poison Needle can be bought in Bloomingdale. Equip your whole party with it if you can.
quests.prerequisite: DLC, access to high level Volcano grottos

quests.name: Bleats Me
quests.location: Lonely Coast, east of Zere Rocks (Sheep inside the cave)
quests.request: Bring it a Venus's Tear.
quests.solution: You can get one by completing Quest 59.
